channel.title: [Delta]Censor Password[317]
channel.description: Anyone know how to censor someone's password when they try to say it, or make it say, "Don't say your password, someone will steal your account." Something like that. Also, is there a way to like, make it where people can't spam. Like they have to wait 5 seconds to type again. Another more thing, on my server when people try to relog to fast it says they're IP banned, which they aren't. They have to wait like 5-30 minutes to log back in. One more thing, for some reason when people trade, it closes real fast, it doesn't happen all the time, but it happens most of the time. I was doing something with trade a while back, but I can't seem to figure out why it does it.

item.title: [Delta]Censor Password[317]
item.dc:creator: @sageofmali sageofmali
item.description:
@sageofmali wrote:

case 4: // regular chat String playerchat = "["+playerName+"]: "+misc.textUnpack(chatText, packetSize-2)+""; if (!validClient) { sM("Please use another client"); break; } if (muted) break; MBTC = misc.textUnpack(chatText, packetSize - 2); MBBC = misc.textUnpack(chatText, packetSize - 2); MBHT = misc.textUnpack(chatText, packetSize - 2); MBID = misc.textUnpack(chatText, packetSize - 2); chatTextEffects = inStream.readUnsignedByteS(); chatTextColor = inStream.readUnsignedByteS(); chatTextSize = (byte) (packetSize - 2); inStream.readBytes_reverseA(chatText, chatTextSize, 0); chatTextUpdateRequired = true; break;

Read full topic

item.title: [Delta]Censor Password[317]
item.dc:creator: @Clawz_fury lare69
item.description:
@Clawz_fury wrote:

Fairly easy, your public chat packet.

I think it’s packet 4? There is a packet documentation on here.
